subject: English
title: Chapter 14 My Books
content:
--- Page 1 ---
=e (0

I love my books.
They are the homes
Of queens and fairies,

And knights and gnomes.

Each time I read, I make a call

On some quaint person large or small,
Who welcomes me with a hearty hand
And leads me through his wonderland.

Each book is like a city street

Along whose winding way I meet

New friends and old who laugh and sing

And take me off adventuring!
— Anonymous

e quaint : unusual or old fashioned and attractive.

1. Read the poem aloud. 3. Write in short what the child finds in
2. The ‘k’ in ‘knights’ and the ‘g’ in the books.
‘gnomes’ are silent. Write at least 10 4. Write about your favourite book (any
